comments.body:
Yeah, we @PicnicBasket hate the fact that moment is full of mutation.
:+1: for adding it to the docs :)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +65,69 @@
    /**
     * Mutates the original moment by adding time.
     * 
     * @param unitOfTime the key of what time you want to add (eg "years" / "hours" etc)
